channel.title: Charsequence on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Charsequence on Simple Solution

item.title: Java Convert ASCII String to lowercase using Google Guava
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to use the com.google.common.base.Ascii class of Google Guava library to convert ASCII String or character to lowercase. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Google Guava library to the Java project To use the Google Guava library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation group: 'com.google.guava', name: 'guava', version: '30.1.1-jre' To use the Google Guava library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.

item.title: Convert CharSequence to InputStream in Java using Apache Commons IO
item.description: In this Java tutorial, we learn how to use the IOUtils utility class in Apache Commons IO library to convert a CharSequence object to an InputStream object. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons IO library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons IO library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'commons-io:commons-io:2.8.0' To use the Apache Commons IO library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
